summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of Frazier Place N.W. from N.W. 132 St. to approx. 280 feet North thereof; and a certain other street and avenue; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25813 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a Local Improvement District Therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
